name: Nave in space
description:
Nave in space

Created by Felipe Fleury Haddad

Can you protect your galaxy from an army of invading aliens?

The great Nasa corporation in the USA hired you to protect the galaxy from an alien invasion. But the aliens developed thanks to the stronger spacecraft of all ships. If he manages to destroy the mother ship in phase 3, he will protect his species.

This was my first game, I hope you like it.

I created this game in 6 weeks in the school of programming 7 Mind

I'm 12 years old and I live in Brazil.
